name: maritimeMelancholy
description:
Your name is Luke Wilson, and you’ve been here a WHILE. 

MOVEMENT - 'WASD' or Arrow Keys
INTERACT- 'E', 'Spacebar', 'Enter'
CATALYTIC JUMP - 'R'
SWORD ATTACK - 'F'
SHOOT - 'G'
PAUSE - 'ESC'

I have made a Homestuck/Hiveswap game for my fanhuman, fantrolls, and friends in the Homestuck community! This is only a demo and a large portion of the artwork in the trailer isn’t present in the game at the moment, but I wanted to finally get it out there since it’s been my baby for the past few months. This was definitely never meant to be an HTML5 game, but the port over wasn't that bad! I definitely had to make some adjustments, though.
